Specify Google Font

Source: R/utils.R
google_font.Rd

Builds Google Fonts URL from family name. Extra weights are given in the ... parameters. Languages can be specified in langauges and must one or more of the language codes as given by google_language_codes().

google_font(family, ..., languages = NULL)

Arguments

family

Font family
...

Font weights to include, example "400", "400i"
languages

Font languages to include (dependent on the font.) See google_language_codes().

Examples

google_font("Josefin Sans", "400", "400i", "600i", "700")
#> Family:  Josefin Sans 
#> Weights: 400,400i,600i,700 
#> URL:     https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Josefin+Sans:400,400i,600i,700
google_font("Josefin Sans", languages = c("latin-ext", "vietnamese"))
#> Family:  Josefin Sans 
#> Langs:   latin-ext,vietnamese 
#> URL:     https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Josefin+Sans&subset=latin-ext,vietnamese

Contents
